caption: The video starts with a conversation between two women, who are in an office discussing something fervently and with apparent concern. The scene then transitions to a man, who also seems to be worried about something and seeks out one of the women to discuss the matter. Later that night, the other woman and her close friend are seen having a late-night snack, and their conversation appears to touch on the events of the day. Subsequently, the previously shown man, seemingly inspired or enlightened by some new information, approaches an older man with white hair, who looks like a leader, and engages in a conversation with him. This leader then gives some tasks or directives to his subordinates.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
